name: Jerry's endless travels:Save Erick
description:
Jerry saves his friend Erick from a ghosts.

This is first game of series "Jerry's endless travels".

Jerry must save his friend Erick from angry ghosts

and bring him to the town.

This story will have a continue in next spectrum game.

And level 2 is more difficult version of this game.

Controls:

Left - L

Right - R

Down- D

Up - U

Fire button 1 - A

Fire button 2 - B

Fire button 3 - C

Created in 2020 using

Multi Platform Arcade Game Designer.
